CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 15, 1958, pg. 13 reads: "Tete-A-Tete- Congressman Adam Clayton Powell of New York (center) engaged in a wit-whetting session with the Rev. James B. Cayce (left), of Ebenezer Baptist Church, and the Rev. Ramsey Bridges of Warren Methodist Church, his host, in Ellis Hotel Lounge before the platform meeting at Central Baptist Church, Friday, which featured Mr. Powell as speaker. Warren Methodist Men sponsored the program. -  Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Rev. James B. Cayce, Adam Clayton Powell, and Rev. Ramsey Bridges, seated in the Ellis Hotel Lounge
